escalation_policy.Description: The escalation policy specifies who will be notified when an incident is created by this alert source

heartbeat.Description: A heartbeat alert source will automatically create an incident if it does not receive a heartbeat signal from your app at regular intervals.

interval_sec.Description: The interval after which the heartbeat alert source will create an incident if it does not receive a ping

summary.Description: This text will be used as the incident summary, when incidents are created by this alert source

incident_creation.Deprecated: The field incident_creation is deprecated! Please use alert_creation instead.

incident_priority_rule.Deprecated: The field incident_priority_rule is deprecated! Please use alert_priority_rule instead.

name.Description: The name of the resource, also acts as it's unique ID

auto_raise_incidents.Deprecated: The field auto_raise_incidents is deprecated! Please use auto_raise_alerts instead.

teams.Deprecated: The field teams is deprecated! Please use team instead.
The field teams is deprecated! Please use team instead.

create_incident_after_failed_checks.Deprecated: The field create_incident_after_failed_checks is deprecated! Please use create_alert_after_failed_checks instead.

subscribed_incident_update_notification_.Deprecated: The field subscribed_incident_update_notification_types is deprecated! Please use subscribed_alert_update_notification_types instead.

subscribed_incident_update_states.Deprecated: The field subscribed_incident_update_states is deprecated! Please use subscribed_alert_update_states instead.
